home_page.p2: My name is Dmitry and I glade to see you in my private space of Internet! :) Here I will share with you some sort of information about me. Should you have any questions feel free to contact me, jumping to the CONTACT ME page and choosing a convenient method.
home_page.p3: By the way you could also find me in social networks. Check the bottom of the page.

about_page.p1: At first I had a big desire to write an outstanding autobiography but unfortunately after several unsuccessful attempts I gave up.  Nevertheless I decided to start with a small step and I am going add short stories about me from time to time. Please don't judge me too harshly it is my first attempt to tell publicly about myself.
about_page.p2: In the first place I would like to tell you about the main reason, which encouraged me to write these lines. In a nutshell I challenged myself. In my childhood studying at school I had difficulties in literature and humanities in the whole. Reading was not my thing in those days. The only exception was perhaps technical literature: math exercises, stories about math and etc. In junior classes in speed reading I always had D and besides I made many mistakes in writing. But in high school having matured and rethinked some aspects of the life I started to read more and more books and things have started to get better. Of course having finished school I didn't feel that I can write quite an understandable text. But last years at school I was passionate about reading and that was not bad at all. And now, many years later, when it's time to grow up I would like to try my skills at the art of writing.
